message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $120 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down a bit to $105.  I believe this product will really meet your needs, and that's a fair price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
You drive a hard bargain, Bob!  I can go down to $98 for you, but that's my absolute lowest.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm getting close to my target, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
